name: Ambulance Parking Simulator 3D
description: Let’s become professional driver! fasten your seat belt and take your ambulance to vehicles parking & driving learner’s area. Ambulance Parking Simulator 3D is an amazingly well designed game created for those who love ambulance driving, amazing graphics and challenging game play. Control your ambulance in a real parking lot with an on-screen steering wheel, acceleration and brake pedals. It’s your duty now to drive the ambulance and reach on parking spot in time. Be careful while driving avoid road accidents and colliding with other objects. It can waste your time and chance to win. While playing this ambulance driving simulator you will feel like you are driving ambulance in your real life. This ambulance simulator is a fun ambulance simulating game and it has realistic controls as well as great dynamic game play.
